Package controller

package controller
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ApplicantController
    Implements all applicant‐side use cases: Browsing projects Submitting and viewing applications Submitting, viewing, editing, deleting enquiries Requesting withdrawal
    ApplicationController
    Manages the application's in‐memory repository of Application entities.
    EnquiryController
    Provides services for creating and managing enquiries within the system.
    ManagerController
    Provides all management operations for the Manager role: Create, edit, delete BTO projects View all projects or only own projects Toggle project visibility Handle officer registrations Process applicant applications and withdrawals Generate summary reports View and reply to enquiries
    OfficerController
    Implements all officer‐side operations: Submitting applications Processing flat selection Registering for projects Viewing registration status and project details Handling and replying to enquiries Generating booking receipts
    ProjectController
    Manages all project‐related operations: Retrieve eligible projects for any user Fetch projects created by a manager or view all projects Lookup, add, and remove projects Filter projects by neighborhood and flat type
    RegistrationController
    Implements registration services for both officers and managers: Add new registrations Retrieve an officer’s own registrations Retrieve all registrations for projects managed by a manager
